title: BONUS POD with Trevor Noah
description: Trevor Noah, host of The Daily Show, sits down with Jon, Jon, and Tommy to talk about how Trump changed comedy, his approach to political humor, and what he's trying to achieve with The Daily Show.
author: hey@crooked.com (Crooked Media)
